content: st from additional row to get the necessary length working needle k1 next r ws p3 *k2 p2* repeat to last st k1 abbreviations st/sts stitch/stitches repeat r1 & r2 until piece measures 17 19 21 /43 co cast on ws wrong side row 48 5 53 5 cm long break yarn leaving a 20 /50 cm yarn rs right side row tail k knit p purl finishing place provisionally cast on sts onto the second knitting needle with ws held together hold the two needles parallel in left hand thread the 20 /50 cm tail into tapestry needle and graft the sts from front and back needle weave in ends block lightly enjoy copyright © 2013 vera sanon all rights reserved for individual non-commercial use only sale unauthorized transfer copying re-publishing distribution and any other commercial usage of this pattern prohibited this pattern can only be downloaded from ravelry com if you got the pattern from another website it is a pirated/stolen version that can possibly contain errors if you are a merchant and want to use this pattern to teach a class please obtain written permission from vera sanon printing or downloading the pattern constitutes agreement with these terms
